meanings.sent1: The ice slowly unthaws in the warm sun.
meanings.sent2: The frozen meat unthaws quickly in the microwave.
meanings.sent3: The popsicle unthaws faster than I can eat it!
meanings.sent4: As the winter fades, the river unthaws its icy grip.
meanings.sent5: The warmth of spring unthaws the frozen ground, revealing new life.

meanings.sent1: She unthaws the chicken before cooking it.
meanings.sent2: The snowman unthaws and melts in the sun.
meanings.sent3: I always forget to unthaw the bread before breakfast!
meanings.sent4: His smile unthaws even the coldest of hearts.
meanings.sent5: The love in her eyes unthaws his frozen emotions.
